entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Otterburn Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
